message:
I’ve implemented `spin_loss` to compute real and generated rewards as  
```
real_rewards   = policy_real_logps   – β·opponent_real_logps  
generated_rewards = policy_generated_logps – β·opponent_generated_logps  
reward_diff = real_rewards – generated_rewards
```
and then apply either  
– logistic loss: ℓ(t)=log(1+exp(−t)) via `F.softplus(-reward_diff)`  
– hinge loss: ℓ(t)=max(0,1−t) via `F.relu(1.0 - reward_diff)`  
When `reference_free=True`, the opponent log‐probs are zeroed. Finally we return `(losses, real_rewards, generated_rewards)`. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks!  
<function=finish>  
<message>The SPINTrainer.spin_loss method has been implemented according to the paper’s definition. Task completed.</message>  
<task_completed>true</task_completed>
